trans-unit.source: Specifies the impersonation behavior for a service operation on a service instance.
trans-unit.target: 指定服務作業的服務執行個體上的模擬行為。

trans-unit.source: Use the ImpersonationOption enumeration to control impersonation in [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的控制項模擬 ImpersonationOption 列舉[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This setting interacts with a configuration property on <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A> in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 這項設定與組態屬性互動上<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A>下表中。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Impersonation is performed if credentials are available and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> is equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果認證可以使用執行模擬和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>等於<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> is equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, a validation exception occurs at service startup time.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>等於<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，服務啟動時會發生驗證例外狀況。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>
